alert.note: Alert for Northwest Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 10:08AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AN AREA OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN HARFORD AND NORTHWESTERN BALTIMORE COUNTIES... Snow will coat the ground in spots late this morning, and with temperatures near freezing this may coat untreated surfaces as well. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph combined with the snow may reduce visibility to near one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Hampstead, Pylesville, Bentley Springs, Upperco, Freeland, Norrisville, Parkton, Hereford, Maryland Line, and Monkton. Interstate 83 in northern Baltimore County will be impacted by this. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when traveling. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination.
